resources.string: App written by Nicholas Wu\nOriginal Game by We\'re Not Really Strangers

Best played with 2 players and with pen and paper on hand.
Get to know your friend, partner, or yourself on a deeper level.
Select just the base deck or from a selection of expansion decks to explore specific topics.
Players alternate turns, reading out the cards to the other person.
Wildcards should not be read out unless both players are involved.
Play until the end to get a special final card!
